audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: This describes workforce optimization and cost management, not business model transformation. Reskilling employees is a Tier 1 efficiency improvement, not fundamental value creation change.

tier_verification: This case appears to be misclassified as tier 1. The majority of claims describe workforce optimization, process automation, and cost reduction - all tier 1 activities. Only C6 (interior design services) has potential transformation elements, but lacks sufficient evidence. The case should likely be reclassified as tier 1 with focus on operational efficiency improvements rather than business model transformation.
